1010011010011111 1011011010100011 0 -> sum: 0101110101000010, cout: 1
0001100110010100 0111011011010010 1 -> sum: 1001000001100111, cout: 0

0111010111000000 0010100111000111 0 -> sum: 1001111110000111, cout: 0
1100000011111101 0010001111101001 0 -> sum: 1110010011100110, cout: 0
0001010000000010 0010000100001000 1 -> sum: 0011010100001011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
